data.text: .Why Technical glitches happens again & again on #NSEIndia Trading Platform? #TOI #DDNewsLive #livemint #dna #ZeeNews #IndiaToday #the_hindu #outlookindia #indiatvnews #mid_day #htTweets #MumbaiMirror #FinancialXpress #DainikBhaskar #NavBharatTimes #timesofindia #AmarUjalaNews

.Any misuse of data by #NSEIndia & any monitoring gain by any official during the period for their own advantage.
.Any penalty by #NSEIndia to any innocent investors/traders/dealers/members during the period because of a technical glitch.

.#CBI should find out the followings for the best interest of the trading community:
.The source of origin of the messages/stock tickers circulated to all types of traders during the period involved through #NSEIndia or through #NSE subsidiary companies.

.Technical glitches again & again on #NSEIndia trading platform is a very serious concern. 

.The Government should entrust #CBI to investigate into a technical glitches faced by traders on May 24; 2018 on the #NSEIndia trading platform. https://t.co/6Z4mgQFk6a
